mapper.select: SELECT a.ACCOMMODATION_ID, a.ACCOMMODATION_NAME, a.PROVINCE_NAME, a.DISTRICT_NAME, a.RATING, inf.DESCRIPTION, inf.GUIDE_LINE, inf.RESERVE_NOTICE, inf.SUMMARY_REVIEW, inf.DIRECTIONS, a.ROAD_NAME, a.BUILDING_NUMBER FROM ACCOMMODATION a LEFT JOIN ACCOMMODATION_INFO inf ON a.ACCOMMODATION_ID = inf.ACCOMMODATION_ID WHERE a.ACCOMMODATION_ID = #{id} GROUP BY a.ACCOMMODATION_ID, a.ACCOMMODATION_NAME, a.PROVINCE_NAME, a.DISTRICT_NAME, a.RATING, inf.DESCRIPTION, inf.GUIDE_LINE, inf.RESERVE_NOTICE, inf.SUMMARY_REVIEW, inf.DIRECTIONS ORDER BY a.ACCOMMODATION_ID

SELECT a.ACCOMMODATION_ID, i.PRIORITY, i.IS_THUMBNAIL, i.ACCOMMODATION_IMAGE_FILE_PATH FROM ACCOMMODATION a LEFT JOIN ACCOMMODATION_IMAGE i ON A.ACCOMMODATION_ID = i.ACCOMMODATION_ID WHERE a.ACCOMMODATION_ID = #{id} ORDER BY i.PRIORITY

SELECT a.ACCOMMODATION_ID, ROUND(AVG(rev.REVIEW_SCORE), 1) AS REVIEW_SCORE, COUNT(rev.REVIEW_ID) AS REVIEW_CNT FROM ACCOMMODATION a LEFT JOIN REVIEW rev ON a.ACCOMMODATION_ID = rev.ACCOMMODATION_ID WHERE a.ACCOMMODATION_ID = #{id} GROUP BY a.ACCOMMODATION_ID

SELECT rev.REVIEW_ID, i.FILE_PATH, i.IS_THUMBNAIL, i.SORT_ORDER, rev.ACCOMMODATION_ID, rev.CREATED_AT, ROUND(AVG(rev.REVIEW_SCORE), 1) AS REVIEW_SCORE, rev.REVIEW_DETAIL FROM REVIEW rev LEFT JOIN REVIEW_IMAGE i ON rev.REVIEW_ID = i.REVIEW_ID WHERE rev.ACCOMMODATION_ID = #{id} GROUP BY rev.REVIEW_ID, i.FILE_PATH, i.IS_THUMBNAIL, i.SORT_ORDER, rev.ACCOMMODATION_ID, rev.CREATED_AT, rev.REVIEW_DETAIL ORDER BY i.SORT_ORDER

SELECT r.ROOM_ID, r.IS_AVAILABLE, r.PRICE, r.ACCOMMODATION_ID, r.ROOM_CATEGORY, r.ROOM_NAME, r.CHECKIN_TIME, r.CHECKOUT_TIME, r.ROOM_COUNT, r.STANDARD_CAPACITY, r.MAXIMUM_CAPACITY, r.BASIC_INFO, r.FACILITY_SERVICE_INFO, r.ROOM_SIZE, b.BED_TYPE, b.BED_COUNT, i.IS_THUMBNAIL, i.ROOM_IMAGE_FILE_PATH, i.PRIORITY FROM ROOM r LEFT JOIN ROOM_BED b ON r.ROOM_ID = b.ROOM_ID LEFT JOIN ROOM_IMAGE i ON r.ROOM_ID = i.ROOM_ID WHERE r.ACCOMMODATION_ID = #{id}
